notes: - Removed reliance on convars, seems like most people have zero idea how to set these up, reverted back to config type.

+ Environment: added get_weather_name function back in was missing from rebuilt
+ config.lua to replace convars, convars are better but the extra step for people is annoying and i rather not have to keep explaining it.
+ added most of the support needed for ND_Core will finish this asap.
